title: Optical tracking, a sold-out draft, another preseason game in Canada and more WNBA news

label.eng: Major League Baseball Rookie of the Year Award
United States men's national soccer team

dataType: Off Top," the WNBA's interview series hosted by Ari Chambers, debuted on Friday, Mar. 8, International Women's Day. Chambers chats with 2023 Rookie of the Year Aliyah Boston and 2022 Rookie of the Year Rhyne Howard, both of whom are participants in the 2024 Player Marketing Agreement cohort.
